title: New GOOD OMENS Perfumes!
author: Black Phoenix Alchemy Lab
comment: So many of these new scents look AMAZING! I "He'd Been An Angel Once" is pretty much my dream scent!
description:
http://blackphoenixalchemylab.com/pro... We've expanded our perfume collaboration with Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett, just in time for the new TV adaptation by Amazon Prime and BBC Two! Your favorite characters and moments from the 1990 novel enshrined in sublimely wearable scents. 

Proceeds go to charities selected by the authors.

Label artwork by Julie Dillon.
